item.title: Shoes... Definitely need to get myself a pair of these
item.description:
Shoes... Definitely need to get myself a pair of these

You already know that the Air Jordan 4 Premium is set to drop in a blacked-out edition replete with croc-style scales and faux pony hair this month. But that may not even be the most eye-popping colorway of the upgraded model. That title would belong to the "Snakeskin" edition, rumored for a summer launch.

item.title: Netflix trying to keep me inside as better weather hits
item.description:
Netflix trying to keep me inside as better weather hits

March is going to be a bittersweet month for Netflix subscribers everywhere. We're losing Jumanji, Gone in 60 Seconds, Hart's War, Men in Black II, the TEDTalks series, and Johnny Dangerously, and we'll miss them all dearly. But where there's loss, there's growth. With death, there's life.

item.title: Spend your money wisely!
item.description:
Spend your money wisely!

When you work hard every single day and there's only so much money left after your regular expenses, you have to make certain it's well spent. Spend your limited funds on what science says will make you happy.
